<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Pistol Twirl](/Feats.aspx?ID=3162) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gunslinger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=406" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 112</row>

**Archetype** [Bullet Dancer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=117) (Level 4)

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5)

**Requirements**
You're wielding a loaded one-handed ranged weapon.

</column>

---

Your quick gestures and flair for performance distract your opponent, leaving it vulnerable to your follow-up attacks. You [Feint](/Actions.aspx?ID=48) against an opponent within the required weapon's first range increment, rather than an opponent within melee reach. If you succeed, the foe is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) against your melee and ranged attacks, rather than only your melee attacks. On a critical failure, you're flat-footed against the target's melee and ranged attacks, rather than only its melee attacks.

<title level="2">Pistol Twirl leads to...</title>
[Showstopper](/Feats.aspx?ID=3202)
